thread.title: WEATHER: Thunder, lightning, rain seen in Inland region
thread.title_full: WEATHER: Thunder, lightning, rain seen in Inland region - Press Enterprise

author: STAFF REPORTS
title: WEATHER: Thunder, lightning, rain seen in Inland region
text:
STAFF REPORTS
Published: Oct. 14, 2015 11:36 p.m. WEATHER: Thunder, lightning, rain seen in Inland region Print Photo Share Pin It More Galleries ADVERTISEMENT Related article Â» Rainfall was falling in several areas of the Inland region on Wednesday night, Oct. 15, National Weather Service gauges show.
Phelan has been hit the hardest, with just shy of half an inch, as of 11:25 p.m.
In the Inland valleys, March Air Reserve Base hit .07 of an inch and Perris hit .04 of an inch.
Thunder was heard in Riverside and lightning strikes were reported in the San Bernardino Mountains.
The Weather Service had forecast a chance of thunderstorms Thursday through Saturday. Another round is expected Sunday and Monday.
